formattedAddress: 55 Water St #28, New York, NY 10041, USA
adrFormatAddress: 55 Water St #28, New York, NY 10041, USA

originalText.text: The absolute worse. I don’t even know why any business will chose this company. If you work for them, I hope you are looking for another employment or are in school, and working for them temporarily.

text.text: The absolute worse. I don’t even know why any business will chose this company. If you work for them, I hope you are looking for another employment or are in school, and working for them temporarily.

originalText.text: Absolutely the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced! Issues trying to order, the order wasn’t ready when promised, and then my card was charged twice! I contacted them and although I sent my card statement showing a double charge, they insisted that I was only charged once. Thankfully my credit card company was on the ball and helped me dispute the charge. 5 stars for capital one, zero stars for delivery.com.

originalText.text: What was once a good service has become overpriced with fees. Sad to see what has become of this company.

text.text: What was once a good service has become overpriced with fees. Sad to see what has become of this company.

originalText.text: Apparently Delivery.com has lost their great customer service agents to the virus and lowered their standards CONSIDERABLY with regards to replacements.  I have made 6 calls over 2 days now, responding to THEIR CALL to me about an order that never arrived;  got hung up on while on hold 3 times and no promised call back 3 more times.  I am done with Delivery.com.

text.text: Apparently Delivery.com has lost their great customer service agents to the virus and lowered their standards CONSIDERABLY with regards to replacements.  I have made 6 calls over 2 days now, responding to THEIR CALL to me about an order that never arrived;  got hung up on while on hold 3 times and no promised call back 3 more times.  I am done with Delivery.com.

originalText.text:
Ive used delivery dot com for years. Didn’t have problems, they always seemed to have gotten my back. Then they all of a sudden they cancelled my account, and tried to blame the merchant, claiming the merchant didn’t want to continue taking my orders, and saying the merchant refunded me for a complaint I had sent.  I never got an email from delivery (because it never happened).   Delivery told me to try another merchant, Which I could not because they “placed an accidental deactivation on my account”. I called the merchant directly who said they had no such call with anyone about any issues. And happily took my order the old fashioned wAy. All was fine. Delivery emailed me after I complained about how sketchy they were, and gave me $20 credit. Which I used, and ordered again. Then, I tried to use their site and their app, and nothing was happening. They must’ve canceled and blocked me AGAIN. When I called customer service this time, they put me on hold, came back and said “there were no problems with my account and everything was fine on their end” and low and behold I could use my app again. Convenient for them. Once I use my points up (so close to $5), I’m done with them.

Do yourself a favor- use another site/app, or just call the businesses yourself.
